title: The Traitor Within
description: A year has passed since Morgana disappeared. But when all seems lost, she is finally discovered. Uther is overjoyed but quickly becomes plagued by dark visions.As the king grows weaker, Gaius discovers that he has been enchanted by someone within the castle. Camelot stands on the brink as Merlin embarks on his most dangerous task yet. He must uncover the traitor within.
author: Mike Tucker
